Medicare Fee-For-Service Public Provider Enrollment API Medicare Opt Out Affidavits API Medicare Order and Referring API Medicare Physician & Other Practitioners APIs Medicare Revalidation Due Date API Medicare Revalidation Clinic Group Practice Reassignment API Medicare Provider and Supplier Taxonomy Crosswalk API NPPES NPI Public Registry API

provider

The goal of provider is to provide performant and reliable open-source tools to facilitate easy access to healthcare provider data through publicly available APIs & sources. The current list of supported APIs are:


  • NPPES National Provider Identifier (NPI) Registry API
  • Medicare Fee-For-Service Public Provider Enrollment API
  • Medicare Order and Referring API
  • Medicare Provider and Supplier Taxonomy Crosswalk API
  • Medicare Physician & Other Practitioners API
  • Medicare Revalidation Due Date API
  • Medicare Revalidation Clinic Group Practice Reassignment API
  • Medicare Opt Out Affidavits API
  • Medicare Market Saturation & Utilization State-County API
  • Medicare Provider of Services File - Clinical Laboratories API
  • CMS Public Reporting of Missing Digital Contact Information API


Installation

You can install the development version of provider from GitHub with:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("andrewallenbruce/provider")

# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("andrewallenbruce/provider")


Provider Information

These APIs are generally concerned with providing access to up-to-date information a provider or her associates may need for many aspects of the transacting of healthcare.

NPPES NPI Public Registry 


# Load library
library(provider)

# Define search parameter
npi <- 1083879860

# Query the NPPES API and unpack the response
nppes_ex <- provider_nppes(npi) |> 
            provider_unpack()


Basic Information

npi prov_type first_name last_name sole_proprietor
1083879860 NPI-1 CHRISTOPHER AARON NO
gender enumeration_date last_updated certification_date status
M 2008-07-22 2021-03-25 2020-05-01 A

Addresses

address_1 city state postal_code telephone_number
792 GALLITZIN RD CRESSON PA 166302213 814-886-8161
10 CASTLE GARDEN CT OLNEY MD 208321443 NA

Taxonomy

taxon_code taxonomy_group taxon_desc taxon_state taxon_license taxon_primary
207Q00000X Family Medicine PA OS019703 TRUE

Endpoints

endpts_endpoint_type endpts_endpoint_type_description endpts_endpoint
DIRECT Direct Messaging Address christopher.l.aaron@upmcdirect.com
endpts_affiliation endpts_affiliation_name
Y UPMC
endpts_address_2 endpts_city endpts_state endpts_postal_code
Floor 58 Pittsburgh PA 152192702


FFS Public Provider Enrollment

What if you need the providerâ€™s PECOS PAC ID or Enrollment ID? Using the provider_mppe() function, you can search Medicareâ€™s Fee-For-Service Public Provider Enrollment API:


mppe_ex <- provider_mppe(npi)


Title of the table
npi pecos_asct_cntl_id enrlmt_id provider_type_cd
1083879860 8426328519 I20200617001010 14-08
provider_type_desc state_cd first_name mdl_name last_name
PRACTITIONER - FAMILY PRACTICE PA CHRISTOPHER L AARON


Order and Referring

Is a Provider currently eligible to:

  • Make referrals to Medicare Part B or a Home Health Agency (HHA)?
  • Order Durable Medical Equipment (DME) or Power Mobility Devices (PMDs)?

Search Medicareâ€™s Order and Referring API with order_refer():

#> Error in order_refer(npi): could not find function "order_refer"


Taxonomy Crosswalk

You may need to find Medicareâ€™s specialty codes for this providerâ€™s taxonomies. You can search Medicareâ€™s Provider and Supplier Taxonomy Crosswalk API with provider_mpstc():


medicare_specialty_code medicare_provider_supplier_type_description provider_taxonomy_code provider_taxonomy_description_type_classification_specialization
8 Physician/Family Practice 207Q00000X Allopathic & Osteopathic Physicians/Family Medicine


Revalidation Due Date

You can check to see if a provider is due to revalidate their Medicare enrollment by accessing Medicareâ€™s Revalidation Due Date API with provider_mrdd():


enrollment_id national_provider_identifier first_name last_name organization_name enrollment_state_code enrollment_type provider_type_text enrollment_specialty revalidation_due_date adjusted_due_date individual_total_reassign_to receiving_benefits_reassignment
I20200617001010 1083879860 Christopher Aaron PA 3 Non-DME Part B Family Practice 1


Missing Digital Contact Information

Providers may need to update their digital contact information in the NPPES system. To check, you can access the CMS Public Reporting of Missing Digital Contact Information API with provider_promdci(). If they appear in the search results, itâ€™s time to update their NPPES contact information:


npi provider_name
1144224569 Clouse,John


Opt-Out Affidavits

You can find out if a provider has opted out of Medicare by searching the Medicare Opt Out Affidavits API with opt_out():


#> Error in opt_out(last = "Aaron"): could not find function "opt_out"


Revalidation Clinic Group Practice Reassignment

provider_rcgpr() accesses Medicareâ€™s Revalidation Clinic Group Practice Reassignment API:

Provider Statistics

These APIs are generally concerned with providing access to a providerâ€™s longitudinal utilization data.

Medicare Monthly Enrollment 

month_ex <- monthly_enroll(year      = 2018, 
                           month     = "Year", 
                           geo_lvl   = "County", 
                           state_abb = "AL", 
                           county    = "Autauga")
